title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\OSPolicy\InventoryFilter
name: InventoryFilter
description:
Filtering criteria to select VMs based on inventory details.

params.description: The OS version Prefix matches are supported if asterisk() is provided as the last character. For example, to match all versions with a major version of 7, specify the following value for this field `7.` An empty string matches all OS versions.
